rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 12 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat) and Tropical Storm CRISING

Issued at: 2:00 AM, 19 July 2025(Saturday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Zambales, Bataan, Cavite, Metro Manila, Batangas, Laguna, Pampanga, Tarlac, Rizal and Bulacan.

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, light to moderate rains affecting Quezon and Nueva Ecija which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 5:00 AM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
